diff_act: 1.allow the definition of maximum message size

regen.absent_element: handling of errors when opening or creating a socket
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle and return an error if the create or open API call for a synchronous socket fails.

regen.absent_element: error handling for maximum message size exceedance
regen.new_specification: The system shall return an error if the message size exceeds the defined maximum message size.

regen.absent_element: handling of outgoing message buffer limits
regen.new_specification: The create and open API calls for synchronous sockets shall allow the application to specify the maximum size of outgoing messages that the socket may buffer.

label: The create and open API calls for synchronous sockets allow the application to specify the maximum message size.
absence: action of specifying the maximum message size
